text: “Ndipo alipo ena mwa anthu omwe akunena: “Takhulupirira mwa Allah.” Koma akavutitsidwa chifukwa cha Allah, amawachita masautso a anthu monga chilango cha Allah, (sapirira; iwowa ndi achinyengo (achiphamaso). Ndipo chikadza chipulumutso chochokera kwa Mbuye wako amanena: “Ndithu ife tidali pamodzi ndi inu.” (Koma chikhalirecho akunena zonama). Kodi Allah sadziwa zomwe zili m’zifuwa za zolengedwa
